cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enumeration value will cause security configuration parsing errors and prevent proper ciphering setup in the CU gNB.

du.explanation_en: Setting modelname to an invalid enumeration value will cause RF simulator configuration errors and prevent proper simulation initialization in the DU gNB.
du.explanation_zh: 將 modelname 設定為無效的枚舉值將導致 RF 模擬器配置錯誤，並阻止 DU gNB 中正確的模擬初始化。
